resources.string: Welcome to Paper Telephone, a fun and multiplayer drawing game. This game involves three steps: draw an image based on a word, pass the device to the next person, and guess the original word associated with the drawing. To begin playing, select the New Game button on the home screen.

A canvas to draw should now be displayed on the screen. Pick any word or phrase that comes to your mind, and create a drawing by touching the screen with your finger. Once finished, pass the device to the next person in the group. This person will now try to guess the word/phrase that the drawing is based on. Once a guess has been made, pass the device to the next person and create a drawing based on the guess of the previous person.
This cycle repeats until the device comes back to the person who initiated the game. At this point, the game ends and a montage of how the game progressed will be shown.
